content.html: Can any of my #webdev or @reactjs friends recommend a simple, responsive, pretty modal package with a small set of dependencies? I've built a thing so far without using any kinda framework at all, so loathed to introduce bootstrap or bulma or whatever at this stage!
content.value:
Can any of my #webdev or @reactjs friends recommend a simple, responsive, pretty modal package with a small set of dependencies? 

I've built a thing so far without using any kinda framework at all, so loathed to introduce bootstrap or bulma or whatever at this stage!
